channel.title: Breachers on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Breachers on Portfolio

item.title: Breachers
item.description:
During this time I got brought onto the production phase of Breachers, where we wanted to bring together CSGO and Rainbow Six Siege into VR. Trailer link

all the features I’ve worked on:

  • ping system
  • attachment refunding
  • Gadgets:
    • Proximity Sensor
    • Cloaking Device
    • Static Field Emitter
    • Incendiary grenade
  • vaulting
  • bot take over
  • in game UI
  • Submission process: VRC’s Quest/Rift
  • Frontend Analytics
  • PSVR port
  • Omni One Port
  • voicechat and related gameplay ellements
  • toxmod support
  • Vive port
